text: Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa arra ga o konomi ni naranai kagiri, jibun jishin no tame no rigai sura jiyu ni dekinai. Watashi ga moshi yugen-kai o shitte irunaraba, watashi wa yoi koto o mashi, mata saiyaku ni awanakattadearou. Watashi wa tada no hitori no keikoku-sha de, shinko suru mono e no kippo o shiraseru hitori no dentatsu-sha ni suginai
